name: Bye-Plane
description:
Bye-Plane is an exploration and resource management game.

You will need an Xbox 360 Pad to play this game.

You may need to put your pad in and reload the page.

Made by 5 students for their dissertation, Bye-Plane is a project that is still in development and the game will be updated regularly to show new improvements and features.

Please feel free to report any bugs and give feedback. :)

Developed by:

Nathan Jones - @NathanielTylerJ

Sam Kidman - @SamKidman117

Joel Pattie - @JoelPattie3D

Tom Pugh - @TomPugh1112

Michael Taylor - @MichaelTDesign

Our websites can be found on our main profile page.
